mapper.insert: insert into link_all_detail ( id, link_all_info_id, service_period_id, site_code, url, scan_level, link_title, parent_title, url_type, resource_type, scope, error_describe, error_code, img_url, scan_time, operator, del_flag, create_time ) values ( #{id}, #{linkAllInfoId}, #{servicePeriodId}, #{siteCode}, #{url}, #{scanLevel}, #{linkTitle}, #{parentTitle}, #{urlType}, #{resourceType}, #{scope}, #{errorDescribe}, #{errorCode}, #{imgUrl}, #{scanTime}, #{operator}, #{delFlag}, now() )
mapper.select:
select count(la.id) from link_all_detail la where la.site_code =#{siteCode} and la.del_flag=0
and la.error_code like '%${terms}%'
and la.service_period_id=#{servicePeriodId}
and la.id not in( select l.id from link_all_detail l left join config_link_except c on l.site_code = c.site_code where l.site_code =#{siteCode} and l.del_flag=0 and c.status =0 and (l.url like concat(c.url,'%')) )
